title: Mastering One-Handed Typing: Techniques and Layouts
description: Whether for accessibility or multitasking, one-handed typing is a useful skill. Learn about half-QWERTY and other layouts.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Why One-Handed?

Injury, disability, or simply holding a coffee/phone in the other hand.

Mirroring

A common technique is to mirror the keyboard layout. When you hold space, the left hand keys act as the right hand keys (e.g., F becomes J).
